Class Item

java.lang.Object
game.entities.Entity
game.entities.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collectible, Collidable
public class Item extends Entity implements Collectible
Represents collectible items in the game. Items scroll from right to left and can be collected by the player.

Item types:

  • COIN - Increases score
  • HEART - Restores health (+20 HP)
  • SPEED - Temporary speed boost (3 seconds, 2.0x speed)

  • Method Details

    • loadItemAnimation

      private void loadItemAnimation()
      Loads sprite sheets and creates animations for all item types. Sets up coin, speed boost, and heart animations.
